articles.title: Watch: First video of European, Japanese spacecraft swooping past Mercury - India Today
articles.description: The video shows the BepiColombo spacecraft swooping past Mercury in its first flyby of the nearest planet to the Sun.

articles.title: European Space Agency's images of galaxy leave netizens amazed; See pics - Republic World
